critique: The document is an executive order regarding the implementation of section 459 of the Social Security Act. It pertains to the garnishment of wages for child support obligations and applies to all executive agencies of the Federal Government. The order directs the Civil Service Commission to issue regulations for uniform implementation and requires each executive agency to issue rules and regulations to comply with the Civil Service Commission's regulations and the Social Security Act. The regulations are to be made available to the public by publication in the Federal Register.
